titleStmt.title: The anatomy of Arminianisme: or The opening of the controuersies lately handled in the Low-Countryes, concerning the doctrine of prouidence, of predestination, of the death of Christ, of nature and grace. By Peter Moulin, pastor of the church at Paris. Carefully translated out of the originall Latine copy
Anatome Arminianismi. English
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.

titleStmt.title: The anatomy of Arminianisme: or The opening of the controuersies lately handled in the Low-Countryes, concerning the doctrine of prouidence, of predestination, of the death of Christ, of nature and grace. By Peter Moulin, pastor of the church at Paris. Carefully translated out of the originall Latine copy

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Nathaniel Newbery, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Concerning the points debated at the Synod of Dort.
This variant lacks Newbery's name on [par.]2v.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
